name: Arona / アロナ / 아로나 / 阿罗娜 (Blue Archive)
description:
Arona (Blue Archive)

アロナ (ブルーアーカイブ) / 아로나 (블루 아카이브) / 阿罗娜 (碧蓝档案)

Usage

Use any or all of the following tags to summon Arona: arona, 1girl, white hairband, bow hairband, halo, short hair, single braid

- You can add blue eyes, two-tone hair, multicolored hair, blue hair, pink hair if necessary.

- mechanical halo can sometimes improve the quality of Arona's halo.

- I tried tagging her different halo types (heart halo, red halo, etc.) but the AI doesn't recognize them very well.

For her normal outfit: school uniform, blue shirt, white sailor collar, long sleeves, white bowtie, white choker

- Images where her stomach was visible were tagged midriff peek or midriff.  This is common in most of her fanart, so the AI tends to draw her this way by default.

For her swimsuit outfit: swimsuit, official alternate costume, black bikini, frills, frilled bikini

For her usual BG environment: ruined classroom, school desk, shallow water, cloud

Not all tags may be necessary. Weight 1 works best with most models. You may need to adjust weight when combining with other LoRAs.

Refer to https://huggingface.co/khanon/lora-training for other Blue Archive characters, training parameters, and datasets.
